title: Google often does not load
content:
Often, when I try to search on Google using the search bar, Firefox will load and load and load... and then fail to actually load up Google and search my query.

It doesn't matter if I do this on a new tab or an existing one, it will load and load for probably about 15-20 seconds, and then acts as if I didn't try to do anything at all.

Once it's had it's moment, and successfully fails to load Google, I can try again and it will instantly load Google when I try again, and will continue to do so for a while.

While this issue is happening, I can load any other website just fine. It only affects Google searches using the address bar.

Any idea on a solution or anything I can try to stop this issue occuring?
creator: aysomcoa

title: Message appeared suddenly on my ff general settings page saying "your browser is being managed by your organization."
content: This message appears in small blue lettering, unlike the rest of the page. I do not have an organization. Mine is a personal computer for just my personal stuff. I tried to find answers in previous posts and all I found were posts saying this was something done by Avast. I do not use Avast. I am an older user and don't understand much, so talk to me like you would if you were writing the Dummies books. What is this thing and how do I get rid of it? It appeared another time long ago. Later disappeared. Have I been hacked? Is someone else controlling my computer? HELP1 I am running Windows 7 Home premium and not changing it. My computer is an older Dell business machine. Its been pretty clean, not had any incidents.
creator: shonatrill
